name: Floaty Fidget Spinner Twist
description:
The first and only play with sound Fidget game. Use your voice to spin the Fidget, A unique way to play the game. Just don’t disturb the people around you by making crazy noise while spinning…. Enjoy!

This game can be used as it is or you can change the assets if you want.

Gameplay:

Use soft voice / whistle to spin the Fidget.
Limited number of spins.
Collect coins after spinning.
In Game shop to unlock fidget, modify speed and grease the wheels.
Many fidget to purchase and play with.
Just don’t Make weird sounds :P
